reviews.review_text: I like the game visuals and the sounds the game supplies. However the game dose freeze up alot...:(
This is the COOLEST WAY TO PLAY BATTLESHIP!!!!! I would reccomend this game to anyone!!!!

Single player, the game works very well. But how do you make a game based on a head-to-head board game and NOT include a multiplayer option?!  3 out of 5 mainly for that reason. It's well made but anyone looking to play battleship will be disappointed by the total lack of multiplayer so...thumbs down.
